text: Guido Volpi (born 22 August 1995) is an Argentine rugby union footballer who plays for the Ospreys as a Number 8. Volpi made his debut for the Ospreys in 2018 having previously played for Narbonne and the Ospreys Development team. He made his Pro14 debut on 14 September 2018 against the Munster. == References == == External links == *Ospreys Player Profile Category:Ospreys (rugby union) players Category:Living people Category:1995 births
title: Guido Volpi
